description.original: Calendar view of your daily notes

dict.text: \"The calendar is best used in con: text: "日历插件最好与日记插件或 Periodic Notes 插件（可在第三方插件中找到）结合使用。"
dict.text: \"Note: Weekly Note settings are m: text: "注意：“每周笔记 ”设置正在移动。我们建议您安装 “Periodic Notes ”插件，以便将来保留该功能。"
text: `文件${filename}不存在。您想创建它吗？`

dict..setDesc(\"For more syntax help, refer t: .setDesc("如需更多语法帮助，请参阅格式参考。")
